column5: Met upwith Skeeter at The Hut  Told Some Stories  , Had Some Laughs  , ate some Good Chile   and Caught Some Fish  Was a Very FUN Day   Skeeter in the Kitchen      Couple from to-day       Rick
Skeeter is the man!  Now, I'd like a hut like that! do you have the plans?  Can Skeeter come with it?
oh, I hope that Mrs Kelly's chili come on, tell the truth, he got skunked and you gave skeeter those fish...

Dann... chili in and of it's self is NOT A FOOD GROUP under the guidelines provided by the Canadian Government. You do not have to eat it, three times a day, every day... just sayin! Be careful lighting that heater after the chili! HH
Chili + Ice Hut + Open Flame =  BIG BOOM!!!!
I take it that diet pepsi thats beside the grill was photo shopped in just in case the ministry came on here right?
Attaboy Skeet    You da dude man Leechman
hey Skeets  who domestimicated you !! All ya need is a little pink frilly apron Did ya try a little Cow Boyz in the chili. Add 2 tbs to it next time.

damn, now you tell me. never even thought of it.  Rick, it was great meeting you and fishing with you. hope we can do it again cause it was fun. and i will take you up on that offer for running and gunning for the whities!
so that's what a diet pepsi looks like...      truth be told, he's hooked on it, make him go all...
Hey Dan  I am heading out in the AM  Not really Targeting Whities,  But you never Know  Rick
Good luck tomorrow Rick. make sure you paint a big white X on the ice so i know where to go to get the big ones.
Dann, your eye's must be going.  Don't you know that when we were growing up we were all told to avoid the yellow snow?!?!  So if he does a yellow X for you others will avoid it...
Loks like good times out there Rick and Dann looks quite comfortable in his on ice man cave kitchen.

ice man cave kitchen--i like that.  hey Rick, how did you make out today???  the perch caught on saturday were dinner tonight..... i used some of the fish batter that was given to me at lake aire this summer. now i got to go out and restock the freezer---LOL been a long time since i said that, but those perch were really gooooood.

Hey Dan  Headed North from your 'Spot'  Fished around the 5th and 6th  'LOTS" of Perch  Ice is Good about 7-8". At the 6th there is a Foot of slush under the ice!!! Takes 5 min to clean the Hole!!!!   I Left you a BIG "X"  You should have no problem finding it!!!   Rick
